thread.title: Played any good mods or SP maps for Portal?

post.author: MBolus
post.body:
Just wondering if anybody here has made or played good SP maps or mods for Portal. Just picked up a few non-id games at a good price, and this is one of 'em.

I know there are several maps listed on steampowered.com, but looking for those suggested by our community. I tried the search function here, and I figure some of you have good ones you haven't posted.
